name: Defend Off Short People| Attack on Titan Fangame
name_original: Defend Off Short People| Attack on Titan Fangame
description:
Defend Shiganshina or die trying in my Attack on Titan Fangame "Defend Off Short People"  (off done on purpose xD)

Kill all Titans and save as many Short People as possible before killing the colossal Titan.

CONTROLS:

  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • E: Upward Dash
  • Left Mouse: Shoot Left Grapple
  • Right Mouse: Shoot Right Grapple
  • Space: Jump/ ODM Boost
  • Shift: Attack
  • Enter: Skip Intro 

Ranks: 

  1. Erwin = 45+
  2. Levi = 40+
  3. Mikasa = 35+ 
  4. Eren = 30+
  5. Armin = 25+
  6. Marco = 20+
  7. Military Police = <20
